STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Real-time tracking for the decentralized world
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from developers using our app to monitor Ethereum transactions
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The real-time updates on new Ethereum transactions have been a game-changer for our dApp. We can now provide our users with the latest data instantly.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: With this app, we finally have a reliable way to track and analyze Ethereum transactions as they happen. It has streamlined our workflows tremendously.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The app's intuitive interface and powerful filtering options make it easy to pinpoint the Ethereum transactions we need to monitor. A must-have for any blockchain project.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about tracking new Ethereum transactions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: This app allows you to discover and monitor new transactions happening on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app connects directly to Ethereum nodes and listens for new blocks being mined. When a new block is detected, we parse all the transactions and make them available through our user interface and APIs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What can I use it for?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can use this app to track payments to your Ethereum addresses, monitor certain smart contracts for new activity, analyze transaction patterns and volumes, and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, the basic version of the app is completely free. We offer paid premium plans with additional features like notifications, data exports, and higher rate limits.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Just sign up for a free account on our website. No credit card is required. Once logged in, you can start adding Ethereum addresses or contracts to watch for new transactions.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Stay ahead of the curve with real-time notifications for the latest transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Discover Ethereum's latest transactions with ease.
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Stay Ahead of the Ethereum Blockchain
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our app provides real-time monitoring of new Ethereum transactions, keeping you informed and up-to-date.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: Etherscan is a leading blockchain explorer and analytics platform for Ethereum.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: Track and analyze Ethereum transactions, accounts, tokens and more.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Trusted by millions of users worldwide.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Secure, reliable, and up-to-date Ethereum data.
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_CREATE_ACCOUNT_PLACEHO: Create an account to track new Ethereum transactions
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log in to your Ethereum transaction tracker
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay ahead of the curve with our cutting-edge Ethereum transaction monitoring service. Powered by leading blockchain technology, EtherScan provides lightning-fast updates on the latest Ether movements across the network. Never miss a beat with customizable alerts and detailed analytics at your fingertips. Simplify your workflow and maximize your edge in the dynamic world of decentralized finance.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay updated with the latest Ethereum transactions as they occur. Our app provides instant notifications for new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Gain valuable insights into Ethereum transactions with our powerful tracking and analysis tools. Monitor specific wallet addresses, token transfers, and more.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Navigate through our intuitive interface designed for both beginners and experienced users. Easily explore and filter transactions of interest.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Set up custom alerts based on your preferences. Get notified instantly when specific transaction criteria are met, such as value thresholds or token types.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Access a comprehensive history of all monitored Ethereum transactions. Analyze past activity, identify patterns, and make informed decisions.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Our app prioritizes security and reliability. Rest assured that your data is protected, and our transaction monitoring services are highly available.
CTA_BODY: Our app provides real-time monitoring of the Ethereum blockchain, allowing you to track and analyze new transactions as they occur.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Gain Valuable Insights into Ethereum Activity
HERO_SUBTITLE: Stay updated with real-time tracking of new Ethereum transactions across the blockchain.
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve by monitoring the latest transactions on the Ethereum blockchain.
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Reach out to us about tracking new Ethereum transactions
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Get instant notifications for new transactions on the Ethereum network.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Monitor smart contract activity and state changes.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Watch specific Ethereum addresses for incoming/outgoing transactions.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Browse and search the entire Ethereum blockchain effortlessly.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Receive custom alerts for transactions matching your filters.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Access our robust APIs to integrate transaction data into your apps.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Finder
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to easily discover and track new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time. Stay up-to-date on the latest activity.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We constantly monitor the Ethereum network for new transactions as they are mined into blocks. When a new transaction is detected, our app immediately notifies you with the details.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: For each new transaction, you'll see the sender and receiver addresses, the amount of ETH transferred, the transaction fee paid, and the transaction hash for lookup on explorers.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial so you can test out the app's full functionality before deciding to subscribe. No credit card required to start the trial.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay updated with the latest Ethereum transactions as they occur with our real-time monitoring system.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Get in-depth insights into each transaction, including sender, recipient, value transferred, and more.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Set up custom alerts and receive notifications for transactions matching your specified criteria.
